title: Julie Julie
brief_description: Julie was sick of living in Broken Hill, so she bought a motorbike and left to ride around Australia. The film shows part of her journey and illustrates the sense of freedom and independence of young people breaking loose.
description: Julie was sick of living in Broken Hill, so she bought a motorbike and left to ride around Australia. The film shows part of her journey and illustrates the sense of freedom and independence of young people breaking loose.
